body: 8 chapters for this completely previsible and mediocre ending? If it wasnt for the elf and delinquent girl series I would have blacklisted this author already.
In this case, you need Arkham Origin Batman or Bale Batman to takedown the scumbag. When I do the interrogations I will do some brutal force, and shout SWEAR TO ME!!

Dude, you need better friends, seriously. Be careful you bald bastard, I swear I WILL find you and take you down for what you did to your friend! And another thing, true friends DO NOT and NEVER do this horrible things to their friends! And don’t worry MC, I believe you will find a better girl who truly loves you and cares about you. Your big sisters? Forget them! Because they already became his bitches, there is no way back, so there! Let the bitches suffer, forget them and move on!

wow man  the hell with this obviously retarded ending?  and yea as the spanish brother below said  WHAT A FUCKING SHITTY ENDING  WAS SO OBVIOUS THAT  DIDN'T GIVE ME EVEN A FUCKING BONER TO FAP AHHHHHHH DAMMIT I REGRET FROM THE VERY BOTTOM OF MY SOUL  WAITING AND READING THIS FUCKING SHIT. BLACKLISTED

Pero que mrd de final.... Ni para jalarsela en este manga H pffff pésimo del capítulo 2 al 8.
Para los que perdieron tiempo igual que yo no recomienden este manga H porque se pierde mucho tiempo en la misma cosa
Finally it’s over. Make some about the delinquent and her mom now.
